attributes.action: provide child fares on all public transport journeys to under 21 year olds in full time education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, when children reach 16 across the United Kingdom they have to pay full adult fares on several journeys, despite being in full time education. Whilst they can get subsidy on certain journeys that are strictly to and from school, or certain extra circular activities in allocated time slots - this is insuffient.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide child fares on all public transport journeys to under 21 year olds in full time education."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15756.asp
